title: What i wanna know about Tahm Kench
body:
What happens when Tahm swallows someone, and then he is ulted by an ally Kalista, who is then in turn swallowed by an enemy tahm kench who is ulted by his own Kalista?
Then if you wanted to be really sneaky kalista could teleport to give base and ult everyone into the fountain.

also cant wait for 1 for all tahm kench when you have all 9 other players inside your belly  

of course this wont be able to happen for some reason but hey its fun to speculate

replies.body: I'm glad Riot was smart this time (well they were smart with kali) but its optional to enter tahm ult and if you don't like his destination don't go in him.

I simply can not wait to ult people into enemy fountain. 

Thank you so much Rito.

Pretty sure Tahm's Devour works similarly to Kalista's ult, the ally controls where they are going to be released. So if you wanna kill them in the fountain, you gotta suicide as well.

~ EDIT I didnt realise you said ult, my bad xD You just gotta hope they don't notice the destination for your ult :P

So do you mean your ally can exit/interrupt your ult?
Once you Ult them, they don't have a choice I presumed..

Pretty much the only reason I played Dota 2 was to use IO (if that's the name) and do the same thing.
League needs more troll champs.
So people(not Summoners) like you can make the game stupid and ruin everyone life

Can "ruin everyone life" ?

Oh dear, don't be so {{champion:104}}

I kinda wanna ruin the fun if I understand his ult properly tahn goes there then his ally is released so tahn would died then ally would just back once he/she/it flashes or moves quickly out of the Fountain

Uhh nope.

Yes Tahm will die, for allah. The ally won't have a chance to get out if you landed at the very back of the fountain.

Yeah interesting points, I'm sure that people will troll pick him.

1) I wonder if the Morgana black shield will stop him from swallowing champions.
2) What happens if a Shen ults the Tahm Kench as he is being swallowed by the other Tahm Kench?
3) What happens if both Tahm Kenchs swallow each other at exactly the same moment?

There are many questions :)

1) Yes Morgana's black shield should if he doesn't break the shield with magic damage first
2) Shen's target would disappear so his ult would stop putting it on a full timer.
3) Good Question ask someone who knows.
